casebody.data:
Charles C. Bauer, Respondent v. The Consumers’ Ice Company, Appellant. Decided October 10, 1891. Appeal by defendant from judgment entered on a verdict of jury in favor of plaintiff, and from order denying motion for a new trial. Edwards & Odell, for appellant. Lachman, Morgenthau & Goldsmith, for respondent.

Before Freedman, P. J., Dugro and Gildersleeve, JJ.

Opinion by Dugro, J.; Freedman, P. J., and Gildersleeve, J., concurred.

Judgment and order affirmed, with costs.
